name: windlight
description:
🍃Windlight

Stylish is deadly

Windlight is an arcade shooter with a sekiro inspired (stolen) posture system. Slash, dash, parry, shoot and rack up points to unlock powerful upgrades (coming soon) and obliterate the hordes of enemies that threaten your home or something idk. 

Source code

The game is entirely open source, check it out on github.

Support 

If you wish to support me (tyvm), you can do so by donating any amount or by heading to my bmc.
